Work Context Description: How much does this job require standing?
How much does this job require the worker to be in contact with others (face-to-face, by telephone, or otherwise) in order to perform it?

Work Context: Work With Work Group or Team
Work Context Description: How important is it to work with others in a group or team in this job?
How often does this job require working indoors in environmentally controlled conditions?

To what extent does this job require the worker to perform job tasks in close physical proximity to other people?
How much does this job require making repetitive motions?

Work Context: Importance of Being Exact or Accurate
Work Context Description: How important is being very exact or highly accurate in performing this job?

Work Context Description: How much does this job require using your hands to handle, control, or feel objects, tools or controls?

Work Context Description: How often does this job require exposure to minor burns, cuts, bites, or stings?

How much decision making freedom, without supervision, does the job offer?
How important is it to work with external customers or the public in this job?
How much does this job require walking and running?
To what extent is this job structured for the worker, rather than allowing the worker to determine tasks, priorities, and goals?
How often do you have telephone conversations in this job?

Work Context: Deal With Unpleasant or Angry People
Work Context Description: How frequently does the worker have to deal with unpleasant, angry, or discourteous individuals as part of the job requirements?

Work Context: Sounds, Noise Levels Are Distracting or Uncomfortable
Work Context Description: How often does this job require working exposed to sounds and noise levels that are distracting or uncomfortable?
How important is repeating the same physical activities (e.g., key entry) or mental activities (e.g., checking entries in a ledger) over and over, without stopping, to performing this job?

Work Context: Impact of Decisions on Co-workers or Company Results
Work Context Description: How do the decisions an employee makes impact the results of co-workers, clients or the company?

To what extent does this job require the worker to compete or to be aware of competitive pressures?

How often does this job require exposure to hazardous equipment?
How automated is the job?

Work Context: Pace Determined by Speed of Equipment
Work Context Description: How important is it to this job that the pace is determined by the speed of equipment or machinery? (This does not refer to keeping busy at all times on this job.)
